attributes.action: boycott theOpening Ceremony of the Beijing Olympics and the Olympic Torch at Downing Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
China,only yesterday,imprisoned Hu Jia,for his work as an Aids activist and a teller of truth about the brutal repression of chinese people by the Chinese government.Hu Jiao is,like yourself,a husband and a father to a young child who he will not live to see.To request our atheletes to boycott the Olympics would be 
unjust.To boycott the Olympic Torch at Downing Street would be only as brave as 
the disabled actress,Francesca Martinez,
who has refused an opportunity to raise the profile of all disabled people-including myself-at the cost of raising the profile of a brutal and repressive regime.We know that Francesca's act,and we hope your own, will not change Communist China.What it will do is awake and arouse the consciences of every British man and woman who rarely reads the newspapers for the politics and flips directly to the Sports pages.These people number in their millions.Please respect their decency and human goodness by giving them an example of honesty from yourself.Thank you so much

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
